title: Ep. 124 - Why Is The Genocide Of Christians Being Ignored?
description:
Why are Trump's enemies always doing stupid and self-destructive things? And why are white Americans always so desperate to prove that they have non-white or non-American heritage? What's wrong with just being a white American? Also, we'll talk about Pastor Andrew Brunson, who was released from a Turkish prison last week after spending two years behind bars for "Christianization." Why is the persecution and genocide of Christians across the globe ignored by people in this country?
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
